title: • Where have you seen this before?
content:
Where have you seen this (attached) typeface before? I know its close to some stuff I've seen by Wijdeveld, but all the references I can find in my books point to something close but not similar... I've also seen stuff like it, much closer, at the NAi too, but obviously cannot just call them up :(

Any help? (thanks for reading!!)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wij_4420.jpg)
author: Tranquil

comments.content: I thought of this... [http://www.ketelone.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093203/http:/www.ketelone.com/ "http://www.ketelone.com/") obviously different but hey it's happy hour!

Sure, tangram is close... what else? Like I said, this feels like a something from Wijdeveld, but has anyone else seen stuff like this? Modular geometry-like faces in any way close to it? I'm sure I've seen it elsewhere... might have to check the ILL...
You're not thinking of [Albers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093203/http:/www.p22.com/products/albers.html), are you?
